# getDefaultScopeAndClaims

Returns the default scope and claims when using a known auth provider

## Import

```ts
import { getDefaultScopeAndClaims } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### knownAuthProviderId

`string`
id of a known auth provider, e.g. "google"

## Returns

`ScopeAndClaims | undefined`
default scope and claims
